analysis.key_quote: Please, Do NOT reintroduce Schedule F, as proposed in Docket ID: OPM-2025-0004, "Improving Performance, Accountability and Responsiveness in the Civil Service."
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the reintroduction of Schedule F, emphasizing adherence to the Constitution and the importance of a nonpartisan civil service, which indicates concerns about politicization and the integrity of the merit-based system.
